transcript:
Customer: Ek hai ne ahiya aavto.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ek minute ha, me aam chalu rakhu. Ek gamme me ne aam dho, aayo same majeshtik, aayo same ek mail nakh de. Ha, ande e sidhu hai ne ola ma bafri ne mati de ne cancel thai jaay chhe.
Customer: Ek be, khota muki de aam ne, be char mail gamna.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji, kaun bol raha hai?
Customer: Me majeshtik siramiks thi sagar baat karu chhu ama.
Executive: Haanji, boliye.
Customer: Mujhe bhi thoda hai na service me issue aa raha hai. Aapke yaha se proper mujhe response nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Haanji, to kya dikkat aa rahi hai, bataiye?
Customer: Aur IL ka package hone ke baad me bhi agar thik se koi reply nahi milega, to mere hisab se ek package ka koi matlab nahi hai hamara. TrustSeal vagera hai na thoda weak ho jaata hai.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: To kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir, bataiye mujhe?
Customer: Haan, dikkat me ye hai ki mujhe jo keyword change karna tha, wo maine bahut baar bola hai lekin abhi tak wo hua nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur dusri baat wo three months se mujhe business bhi nahi mil raha hai abhi isme. Itna bada package hone ke baad bhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To vahi me jaanna chah rahi hu sir, matlab buyleads kaam ki nahi hai, call fake hai, inquiry kharab hai, kya dikkat aa rahi hai, vahi me puchh rahi hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hamara yaha par aane ke wo visit kiya customer ne tab tak sab better follow, sab best follow up tha. Aur abhi wo token amount dalne ke liye bhi wo bolte hai ki aaj aaj kal kal fir phone switch off, fir band kar dete hai uthana. Ye aisa to maine kabhi kahi dekha nahi hai real industry me to.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Jab customer agree ho na, uske baad me uska cancellation ka jo chances hai na wo almost nahi ke barabar hota hai.
Customer: Almost nahi ke barabar.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan, to aapki ye industry me ye ratio sabse higher hai. Yes hone ke baad bhi wo no me convert hone ka ratio sabse higher hai na maine aaj tak hai na, mujhe seriously fake buyers lagte hai isiliye bol raha hu me. Ye sab chiz mujhe achha nahi lag raha hai IndiaMART se. Itna follow up liya, sab kuch achha diya, sab okay kara liya, quotation okay, rate okay, fir bolte hai me chalo agree hu me payment kar raha hu, fir phone band, fir koi reply nahi.
Customer: Fir roz ka follow up, fir last me yahi sidha itna hi bolna ki ab aap phone mat karo maine le liya hai. To ye word mere hisab se sahi nahi hai.
Customer: Kahi na kahi aapke, aapke ye jo strategy hai na. Haan, humko bhi pata hai ki aap kahi buyer aapka ye log aake karate hai. Thik hai wo bhi maine maan liya. Lekin kuch to idhar ke jo log hai follow up lene wale, unko bhi thoda value rehna chahiye na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir, aapki baat me, me kya bolna chah raha hu.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul.
Customer: Aapka shubh naam kya hai mam?
Executive: Sir, mera naam hai Priya. Aapne jo call kiya hai wo mujhe hi kiya hai. Aapne customer care pe kiya hai but call wo mujhe hi jaega jo me aapke account manager hu.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Haanji. To jaise ki hamari us din bhi baat hui thi na sir, to wo categories change karani thi aapne bola. To wo ek category jo aapne bola wo aapki change bhi ho gayi agar aapne check kiya hoga to.
Customer: Check karna to mujhe itna aata nahi hai computer.
Executive: Ah, aapne us din wo, hmm. Fake buyer wali baat ki thi aur ye digvijay singh phone nahi utha rahe. To mujhe kisse baat karna hai ye aap clear aap hi kar dijiye. Agar aap Priya mam to aap hi kar dijiye. Ye clear kar dijiye mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai. Future me mujhe koi interest nahi rahega aise kaam hua na to.
Executive: Sir, vahi to me aapko bhi bol rahi hu na ki aapki baat maine us din bhi suni thi na, aaj bhi sun rahi hu, us din bhi humne sari chiz discuss ki thi aur me aaj bhi yahi bol rahi hu ki wo fake buyer wali aapki jo baat hai. Ab customers kuch bol rahe hai to vaha pe humne wo chize to dekhni hai. Ab aap bol rahe hai ki customer pura deal lene ke baad wo.
Customer: Ek ek kaam kariye, ek me aapko ek number deta hu, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Chalo wo purana chhod dijiye. Abhi ek hai na ye number deta hu. Ye mujhe token dalne ke liye bol rahe the. Abhi ye switch off, abhi phone hi receive nahi kar rahe kisi ka bhi. To aisa maine kabhi dekha nahi industry me mam.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Ke mera deal ho gaya, mujhe okay ho gaya. Fir bhi chalo me manta hu ki last me deal hua, mujhe fir bhi kuch kam jyada hai to me fir bhi aisa bolunga ki nahi mam aur bhi mahanga pad raha hai, ye hai wo hai. To wo bhi man sakte hai. Chalo fir final negotiation ke baad me maine okay kar diya.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Almost case me hai na aapka no no no hi sunne me aata hai.
Executive: Achha, matlab jo customers se aap pura follow up lene ke baad.
Customer: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Customer: To mujhe follow up zero to chahiye hi nahi mam.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Warna IndiaMART bhi thik thi, ye bhi pakka hai. Warna IndiaMART nahi chahiye. Wo system to thik hai, IndiaMART thik hai.
Executive: Hmm. Sir, me matlab ye jaanna chahti hu ki aapki profile pe 4 by 5 ki rating hai.
Customer: Mere paas, mera me aapko ye bata sakta hu ki me aapko ek crore rupaye ka package kara sakta hu. Ye mere me potential hai aur hamesha rahega. Aapka package jitne tak hai na vaha tak mera potential hai ki me kar sakta hu.
Executive: Bilkul sir, bilkul agree hu.
Customer: Lekin ye chiz mujhe hai na, ye chiz mujhe samajh me kabhi nahi aayegi. Mujhe IndiaMART ke rules regulation se nahi kaam karna to. Ye bhi pakka hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm. Haan, agar system aapka hai to hamara bhi hai. Ki haan aisa mujhe nahi chahiye.
Executive: Agreed.
Executive: Sir, me just ek chiz aapse puchhna chahti hu, vahi jo maine ratings ki aapki baat ki, 4 by 5 ki aapko total 551 logo ne di hai. To matlab kuch to aapki inse dealing hui hogi, baat hui hogi, tabhi customer rating.
Executive: Haanji.
Executive: Rating de raha hai ya to aapka product purchase kiya hoga ya to baat hui hogi. Do reason to honge.
Customer: Ye ek, ye ek number tha, usme hai na, hmm, hmm. Ki usme kahi se liya hai aur aapne naam hamara de diya hai. To ye bhi ek aap check karna hai. Uska bhi ek me bol sakta hu.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Ye abhi ye jo number diya na, wo ek token issue wala hai ki abhi wo token nahi dal rahe, thik hai? Wo aap ek dekh lijiye. Dusra ye, ye jo aapne, aap mujhe clear kar dijiye na ki ye kidhar gaye abhi ye sab. Ye aap bol rahe hai ki humse liya lekin wo humse liya nahi hai. To me bhi yahi, yahi soch raha hu ki ye liya kidhar se in logo ne.
Executive: Ek second sir, mujhe yaha pe thoda confusion ho raha hai. Aapne jo number bheja aap ye bol rahe hai ki in logo ne bola hai inhone aapse product purchase kiya hai but aap keh rahe hai ki nahi purchase kiya hai.
Customer: Abhi jo number diya na mam, haan, haan. Uska token issue hai. Sab okay hone ke baad me bhi wo token karane wale hai lekin wo nahi kiye. Thik hai? Abhi ye dusra number deta hu. Ye jo number hai na, usme IndiaMART me aisa show ho raha hai ki unhone humse material liya hai. Aap usme chahe to dekho ye digvijay singh ne iska ye screenshot bhi bheja tha.
Executive: Achha, achha.
Executive: Haan, haan. Rating sahi hai aapki.
Customer: Haan, barabar hai? To yahi me bol raha hu. To ye party ne humse to material liya nahi hai. To hamara naam kyu aa raha hai usme, me ye bol raha hu. Me is baat pe agar aa raha hai na to aap mujhe isko proof kariye. Iska mujhe proof nahi milega na to sure hai ki next time IndiaMART nahi rahega mere paas. Seriously nahi rahega. Mujhe hai na, haan ya to meri team me gadbad hai na to mujhe team bhi nahi chahiye, me team change kar dunga puri.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm. Iska mujhe proof chahiye ki ye kaha se liye na, ye aapko manage karna hai. Kidhar se kariye wo aap dekho.
Executive: Me discuss karti hu isko is regarding jo aapne bheja hai ki inki aapse dealing hui hai, nahi hui hai, buyer kyu keh raha hai aur isme aapki kya baat hai sir, thik hai? IndiaMART me me ek aapko janta hu, thik hai? Ek digvijay singh ko janta hu. Bilkul.
Executive: Aap aur fir me majeshtik ka package renew ho jaata hai aur aapse nahi kiya to aap bhi sochoge na ki inka connection to sirf hum dono se hai. Ye kaha se aaya? To same me iska owner hu ye company ka. Barabar hai? To ye chiz humse gaye hi nahi hai to kaha, kaha se? To ye mujhe, ye iska bhi proof chahiye ki kyu nahi hai hamare paas.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Thik hai sir, me ek baar ye baat karke aapko update karungi. Ha, baki at least kabhi possible hai ki usko bas kuch soche bina bhi kar diya to bhi chalega. Kisi aur se material liya to mujhe koi order se abhi dikkat nahi hai lekin ye gadbadi se dikkat hai. Abhi jo chal raha hai na wo gadbadi hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Ki un logo ne ye review diya, humse liya hai, sab kuch dikhaya lekin mujhse liye hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Sir, ek chiz me aapko batana chahti hu ki ye jo review hota hai na jo customer aapko 551 logo ne diya hai, isme aise bhi customers hai jinhone jinki sach me aapse dealing hui hogi inhone aapko 1 2 3 4 stars diya hoga aur kuch isme aise bhi customers honge jinhone sirf aapko shayad call kiya ho, sirf aapko message kiya ho but still rating ka option unko bhi milta hai to unhone us basis pe bhi to rating di hoti hai. To zaruri nahi hai jo ye 551 users hai in sabse aapki dealing hui ho aur zaruri bhi nahi hai ki 551 se aapki ek me se bhi dealing nahi hui hogi. Ask for review open to.
Customer: Abhi dekhiye, haan. Ek ye review ka jo page aapne bheja na, usme, haan, haan. Sirf ek hi party se deal hua hai, uska naam hai Amraram. Aur ek, bas ek Amraram ek hi hai. Baki koi, achha 12 september ko jo hua hai.
Customer: Haan, ek hi, haan. Aur ye jo kal 2 november ki ek rating padi hai Pratik S. Dua koi bharaouch gujarat ke hai double charge tiles inse kuch baat hui, dealing hui, kuch hua tha?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Pratik S. Dua hai, behraich, bharaouch gujarat se, abhi kal ki rating hai 2 november ko double charge tiles se related kuch.
Customer: Nahi, aisa nahi hua. Nahi hua. Achha dealing nahi hui, baat hui thi, koi call hua tha, koi inquiry pe revert kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Call hua hoga, call hua hoga, call hua hoga. Ji. To sir, wo vahi me aapko bol rahi thi ki ye jo rating hoti hai isme aapke wo customers bhi hote hai aur me aapko ek chiz aur batati hu jaise maan lijiye agar aap apne lead manager check karenge, apna data check karenge, maan lijiye aapko kuch aise customer bhi milenge jo aapke paas IndiaMART se aaye honge but unhone aapko kuch nahi di hogi aur kuch aise bhi honge jinse aapki baat hui hogi still unhone aapko 5 by 5 stars ki rating di hogi. To ye dono hota hai kyuki agar koi customer aapko aaya hai ya aapko message to wo sare aapke lead manager pe hai aur lead manager pe ask for review ka option hota hi hota hai customer ke paas to wo rating dega aapko chahe wo.
Customer: Wo, wo to me samajh gaya ki google me open reviews aap de sakte ho vaise isme de sakte ho, wo bhi thik hai. Lekin iske basis pe aap judge karte ho ki ye log sab aapse leke gaye. Nahi hai sir, ye to aap confirmation karenge na. Haanji, to ji. Amraram ke alawa koi leke, haan, haan. Amraram ke alawa koi leke nahi gaya hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Mam, aapko ek hi batata hu, potential hamara Morbi me sabse highest rahega. Agar aapko nahi lag raha to me isme, me agree hu, me, me, me jaise Trade India band kiya vaise ye kar dunga. Mujhe koi dikkat nahi hogi. Sir, aap, mera khud ka bhi bahut sara business chal raha hai. Nahi mujhe hai na aap, aap service nahi de pa rahe ho ye pakka hai. Service kisko bolte hai? Aap IndiaMART me hai, aapka salary aap IndiaMART ko growth karke nahi de rahe ho Priya mam. Thik, four months me out honge. Jo bhi hai. Ya Priya mam owner hai to Priya mam kisi ko out kar degi agar senior hai uske niche koi hai kaam nahi kar raha thik se to usko nikal degi na.
Executive: Ji. Haan, to salary kyu pay karegi? Aur mujhe yaha par nahi milega wo jo bhi hai wo aapko manage karna hai. Mujhe milna chahiye. Mere team vim sab kuch chhod dijiye. Priya mam sirf mujhe pehchanti hai. Mujhe nahi mila to sab khatam hai. Me band karunga. Yahi ek option rahega, thik hai?
Executive: Hmm. Me, kaise karna, kya karna wo sab aapke upar hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm. Aur dekho, agar aap apna achha karoge to aapka performance Morbi me bada hi hai, bada hi raha hai. To hopefully me bhi yahi bolunga ki mera agar IL se agar maan lo top pe rahega package for one year ka to aap ye bhi bol sakte ho na ki one year tak ke bhi packages humne Morbi me diye hue hai. To wo aapke liye bhi useful hai, sirf mere liye fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir, bilkul aapki baat se me agreed hu. Mujhe aisa kuch bhi aapki baat se issue nahi lag raha hai. Bas ye kya internal hai me ek baar wo check karwa kar hi aapko bata paungi. Aur ek ye Odisha mam maine jo likha na Atanksha mam naam hai uska. Haan. Thik hai, ek baar unke saath ek baar baat kariye na abhi. Wo bol rahi hai ki me aapko 10 minute me token amount kara deti hu lekin wo nahi kara rahe. To wo kya chiz hai, kya chal raha hai? Matter kya hai? Agar wo mana kar de mujhe koi dikkat nahi. Me follow up close karunga, group band kar dunga, nikal dunga. Phone me jagah bhi bahut use hota hai isiliye wo delete bhi kar dunga. To koi dikkat nahi hai. Haan, lekin wo atka ke rakhne ka kya meaning kya hai? Mujhe ye samajh me nahi aa raha. Ji, ji, ji. Me dekh leti hu ek baar apni mam se baat karke aapki kya chize kis accordingly ho paengi sir. Aap hi mujhe call kariyega, thik hai na?
Executive: Thik hai sir, bilkul me aapko call kar dungi. Haan, thik hai, okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing service issues, no proper response.

- Keyword change request not yet fulfilled.

- No business in the last three months.

- Token amount pending, phone switched off.

- Fake buyers and high cancellation ratio.

- Wants to know why material is shown taken.

Resolution:

- Executive assured to check internally.

- Executive will discuss with senior mam.

- Executive will call back to update.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- service, buyleads, token amount, fake buyers, ratings, follow up
